remarks.para: One may be inoperative for associated inoperative bleed system(s).

numlitem.para: No flight into known or forecast icing conditions.
Aircraft remains at or below FL350.

placard.para: Placard near HI STAGE light located on Bleed Air Supply Module (M10259) on P5 panel "HI PRESS S/O VLV INOP and HI STAGE LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Notify Flight Dispatch. Flight operations may be affected.
Select affected Bleed Air Switch OFF.
